title: Add visible hashtags section and SEO metadata

requirements.summary: Add a customer-facing “Hashtags” block that renders the provided hashtags exactly as given.
acceptanceCriteria: A “Hashtags” section/block is present on the live customer website UI.
All hashtags are shown exactly as the user provided (including spacing in “#veg momos”).
All non-hashtag UI text added for this change is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for the provided hashtags as an ordered string list, preserving exact text (including the space in “#veg momos”).

Add a reusable HashtagsBlock component that displays an English section title ("Hashtags") and renders each hashtag as readable text (optionally styled as pills/chips) without modifying the hashtag strings.
Wire the new HashtagsBlock into the customer-facing UI (e.g., near the bottom of the page before the footer) so it is visible on the live website and not shown only in admin-only views.

requirements.summary: Include the provided hashtags in HTML metadata for SEO/discoverability while keeping existing branding text intact.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes metadata that contains all provided hashtags exactly as provided.
Existing title/description content remains present (may be extended but not removed).

file_operations.description: Update HTML metadata to include all provided hashtags exactly as provided (including the space in “#veg momos”), by adding an appropriate meta tag (e.g., keywords) and/or appending to the existing meta description without removing existing title/description branding text.
